comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3081?focusedCommentId=16588077) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Looked into this. Offering PLAIN authentication requires taking on cyrus-sasl as an optional dependency. Impala contains a SASL-ized Thrift transport:

https://github.com/apache/impala/tree/master/be/src/transport

I'm not sure why this is not a part of Apache Thrift but we can remove it if it ever is
